title: A treatise of wool and the manufacture of it in a letter to a friend, occasion'd upon a discourse concerning the great abatements of rents and low value of lands ... : together with the presentment of the grand jury of the county of Somerset at the general quarter sessions begun at Brewton the thirteenth day of January, 1684.
author: Clarke, George, fl. 1677-1685.
notes: Written by George Clarke. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
First published as: A treatise of wool and cattel. 1677.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
